properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NM , DECODE(MEMBER_GENDER, 'M','남','여') 성별 FROM "MEMBER" WHERE UNREGISTER_FL = 'N' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_NM = ?, MEMBER_GENDER = ? WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET MEMBER_PW = ? --새 비밀번호 WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? -- 현재 비밀번호 AND MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE "MEMBER" SET UNREGISTER_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_PW = ? AND MEMBER_NO = ?
